728329f-b.text:
(1)
Amity Street, north side, west from White Plains Ave. (Charles
Street) to Fletcher Street (Rosebank).
July 15, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
No. 8 Amity Street, seen in view 1, directly preceding the
tree.
July 15, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
A view northward from in rear of No. 8 Amity Street. The houses shown, face on the south side of St. Marys Ave.
July 15, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
728329f-b.original_title: Richmond: Amity Street - White Plains Avenue
